Threatening …Nxc3 and …Nxf4; exf4 cxd4
! The best choice. White will still lose material, but will have more active pieces and pressure on the dark squares. Black should still be better, but will have to work hard.
? White takes another tempo to trade off the Knight he just gave up a pawn to put on c4. 9. dxc5 Nxc3 10. Qd3 (or 9. Bd6) would be much better.
